snippet.title: Chasmal Fear | Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
On April 17, 2025, Chasmal Fear will be available on Steam to remind you what true fear feels like.

Chasmal Fear is a next-gen tactical shooter survival horror game that uses bodycam-style visuals to create a level of immersion that feels unnervingly real. Every flickering light, every distant echo, every shadow lurking in the dark—it all pulls you deeper into the nightmare.

Navigate the eerie, abandoned sci-fi underwater station, manage scarce resources, and decide - will you fight, sneak, or run? Every choice shapes your survival. And if fear threatens to consume you… bring a friend. Co-op mode lets you face the horror together—but just remember, this place doesn’t want you to leave.
. 
Wishlist Chasmal Fear on Steam Now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2597570/Chasmal_Fear/
